Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 167 Trade Apprentice Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 10:40 IST
 Hindustan Copper Limited
 167 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Madhya Pradesh |  Salary : 7,000 to 8,000




FOLLOW

The Hindustan Copper Limited (HCL) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 167 Trade Apprentice Positions. Those candidates who have completed their 10th Pass, ITI can apply for the Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025. If you are looking for more information, like the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts is given below. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Madhya Pradesh.

Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Trade Apprentice 	167	10th Pass, ITI

Age Limit for the Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 25 years.

Selection Process for the Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 7,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 8,000 /- per month.
How to Apply for the Hindustan Copper Limited Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Trade Apprentice Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	07-08-2025
Last Date of Application	27-08-2025
Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
